plays.text: Penalty to Marek Malik 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Peter Bondra

Penalty to Jeff Halpern 2 minutes for Elbowing Erik Cole
Penalty to Niclas Wallin 2 minutes for Hooking Glen Metropolit
Penalty to Brendan Witt 5 minutes for Fighting Bates Battaglia
